Comment: Kennedy might be floating the idea as a trial balloon for the GOP.  If so, this would be a refreshing change in direction.  Otherwise it's just more of the same BS.   From day one, there have only been two outcomes for this conflict.  The crux issue is Putin's ambition to restore the Russian/Soviet empire to former greatness.  Either that dream gets crushed or it doesn't.        Crushing it requires a resounding Russian defeat (possibly followed by a short walk out a high window) that resonates in Russian society for generations.  Not crushing it, our current path, means endless wars in Europe.  You can't give a bully what he wants and expect him to not ask for more.  Churchill understood this.  Reagan understood it.  Trump?  He admires Putin's style.       With only a bit of Reagan-like pressure Trump could tip the balance and go down in history as a great leader. I suspect the old-guard Reagan worshipers are floating that idea in hopes of salvaging something.  They are rightly wondering why we can't have greatness instead of this diaper-baby golf capitulation.    Remember this gem?    [https://youtu.be/UaVWRetR4jg](https://youtu.be/UaVWRetR4jg)  And this one?   [https://youtu.be/nqhmtzG-OK4](https://youtu.be/nqhmtzG-OK4)  We were warned.
